titleStmt.title: Obedience due to the present knig [sic], notwithstanding our oaths to the former written by a divine of the Church of England.
titleStmt.author: Whitby, Daniel, 1638-1726.
Fullwood, Francis, d. 1693.

notesStmt.note: Ascribed both to Daniel Whitby and (by Wing 2nd ed.) to Francis Fullwood. According to Halkett & Laing the ascription to the latter is erroneous.
Place and date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
Dated in ms at head of title: before 24 Sep. 1689.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
